src:
Kutukan Bek Kiri Barcelona: Tentang Jordi Alba yang tak Tergantikan
04 Nov 2019, 11:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bek kiri merupakan salah satu posisi yang sulit digoyang dalam skuad Barcelona. Sejak kedatangan Jordi Alba dari Valencia pada tahun 2012 lalu, dia telah menjadi penguasa pos bek kiri Barca. Mutlak, tak tergantikan.
Sebagai salah satu bek kiri terbaik di Eropa, Alba telah memaksa sejumlah pemain potensial tetap duduk di bangku cadangan. Sudah ada banyak korban dari ketahanan Alba, dia tetap bermain seperti biasanya.
Menurut Marca, korban teranyar Alba adalah Junior Firpo, mantan pemain Real Betis. Firpo tidak datang dengan murah, kabarnya Barca harus mengeluarkan hingga 30 juta euro plus bonus bersyarat.
Sayangnya, pemain mahal dan potensial itu tampaknya bakal tersingkir seperti korban-korban sebelumnya. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Curse of the Barcelona Left Back: About Jordi Alba, who is irreplaceable
Nov 04 2019, 11:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Left back is one position that is difficult to shake in the Barcelona squad. Since the arrival of Jordi Alba from Valencia in 2012, he has become the ruler of the left-back Barca post. Absolute, irreplaceable.
As one of the best left-backs in Europe, Alba has forced a number of potential players to remain on the bench. There were already many victims of Alba's endurance, he kept playing as usual.
According to Marca, Alba's latest victim is Junior Firpo, a former Real Betis player. Firpo does not come cheap, Barca reportedly had to spend up to 30 million euros plus a conditional bonus.
Unfortunately, the expensive and potential players seem to be knocked out like previous victims. Read below, Bolaneters!
